action.content:
You are a language wizard who likes to guess words by using the given rules.

Welcome to Wordle! You have six attempts to guess the target word, a valid English word of five lowercase letters (a-z). Please use the tags "explanation:" and "guess:" to provide a concise explanation for each guess.

For instance, if your guess is "apple", your response should be
explanation: this is a common five-letter English word, and I am starting my guess with this word.
guess: apple

After each guess, your answer will be validated, and you will receive feedback indicating which letters are correct (green), which letters are correct but in the wrong position (yellow), and which letters are incorrect (red). This feedback can be useful in determining which letters to include or exclude in your next guess.

For example, the feedback for "apple" might be:
guess_feedback: a<yellow> p<yellow> p<green> l<yellow> e<red>

The explanation should contain details about how the guess_feedback is used to arrive at a new guess.

Do not generate any other text.

Let's begin with your first guess.

explanation: I will start with the word "crane" as it contains a mix of common consonants and vowels.
guess: crane

attempts = 1
target_word = viper
guess = crane
guess_feedback = c<red> r<yellow> a<red> n<red> e<yellow>

guess_feedback: c<red> r<yellow> a<red> n<red> e<yellow>

Provide your response only in this format.
explanation: details
guess: word

explanation: The letters "r" and "e" are in the word but in the wrong position. The letters "c", "a", and "n" are not in the word. I will guess "rover" to test new letters and reposition "r" and "e".
guess: rover

attempts = 2
target_word = viper
guess = rover
guess_feedback = r<red> o<red> v<yellow> e<green> r<green>

guess_feedback: r<red> o<red> v<yellow> e<green> r<green>

Provide your response only in this format.
explanation: details
guess: word

explanation: The letter "e" is in the correct position, and "r" is also correct but was previously misplaced. "v" is in the word but in the wrong position. "o" is not in the word. I will guess "liver" to test "l" and "i" and reposition "v".
guess: liver

attempts = 3
target_word = viper
guess = liver
guess_feedback = l<red> i<green> v<yellow> e<green> r<green>

guess_feedback: l<red> i<green> v<yellow> e<green> r<green>

Provide your response only in this format.
explanation: details
guess: word

explanation: "i", "e", and "r" are in the correct positions. "v" is in the word but misplaced. "l" is not in the word. I will guess "dived" to test "d" and reposition "v".
guess: dived

attempts = 4
target_word = viper
guess = dived
guess_feedback = d<red> i<green> v<yellow> e<green> d<red>

guess_feedback: d<red> i<green> v<yellow> e<green> d<red>

Provide your response only in this format.
explanation: details
guess: word

explanation: "i", "e", and "r" are in the correct positions. "v" is in the word but misplaced. "d" is not in the word. I will guess "drive" to test new letters and reposition "v".
guess: drive

attempts = 5
target_word = viper
guess = drive
guess_feedback = d<red> r<yellow> i<yellow> v<yellow> e<yellow>

guess_feedback: d<red> r<yellow> i<yellow> v<yellow> e<yellow>

Provide your response only in this format.
explanation: details
guess: word

explanation: "r", "i", "v", and "e" are in the word but misplaced. I will guess "river" to reposition these letters.
guess: river

attempts = 6
target_word = viper
guess = river
guess_feedback = r<red> i<green> v<yellow> e<green> r<green>

guess_explanation: I will start with the word "crane" as it contains a mix of common consonants and vowels.
The letters "r" and "e" are in the word but in the wrong position. The letters "c", "a", and "n" are not in the word. I will guess "rover" to test new letters and reposition "r" and "e".

The letter "e" is in the correct position, and "r" is also correct but was previously misplaced. "v" is in the word but in the wrong position. "o" is not in the word. I will guess "liver" to test "l" and "i" and reposition "v".
"i", "e", and "r" are in the correct positions. "v" is in the word but misplaced. "l" is not in the word. I will guess "dived" to test "d" and reposition "v".
"i", "e", and "r" are in the correct positions. "v" is in the word but misplaced. "d" is not in the word. I will guess "drive" to test new letters and reposition "v".
"r", "i", "v", and "e" are in the word but misplaced. I will guess "river" to reposition these letters.
